data.comment: The match has started at London Stadium.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at London Stadium.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Wolverhampton.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 8, Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Martin Atkinson awards West Ham a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Free kick West Ham.
Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Wolverhampton.
Goal! West Ham have got their heads in front thanks to a Jarrod Bowen strike.
In the minute 17, Pablo Fornals with an assist there.
Throw-in Wolverhampton.
West Ham's Michail Antonio is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, In London West Ham's Pablo Fornals is caught offside.
Raul Jimenez (Wolverhampton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
West Ham pushes forward through Tomas Soucek, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 25, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Martin Atkinson blows against Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez for offside.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, In London Wolverhampton attack through Pedro Neto. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, In London, Tomas Soucek (West Ham) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
West Ham push forward at London Stadium and Jarrod Bowen gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolverhampton defence.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 33, Michail Antonio for the home team is judged to be offside.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Free kick West Ham.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton drive upfield and Joao Moutinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a West Ham defender.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 37, Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Important block from the Wolverhampton defence as Tomas Soucek fires in a strike for West Ham.
In the minute 38, West Ham's Michail Antonio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at London Stadium.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 40, Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to West Ham's area.
Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
Martin Atkinson signals a West Ham throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In the minute 42, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In London West Ham drive forward through Michail Antonio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
West Ham's Pablo Fornals breaks free at London Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at London Stadium.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Ruben Neves of Wolverhampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. West Ham have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
The first-half is over at London Stadium.
The second-half is underway in London.
In the minute 47, West Ham have a dangerous throw-in.
The match at London Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ryan Fredericks, who is down injured.
Ben Johnson (West Ham) has replaced the possibly injured Ryan Fredericks.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
West Ham are in shooting range from this free kick.
Wolverhampton's Conor Coady has been booked in London.
In the minute 52, Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in London.
In the minute 56, Joao Moutinho for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Martin Atkinson awards West Ham a goal kick.
Pablo Fornals hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for West Ham!
In the minute 57, Goal! Jarrod Bowen extends West Ham's lead to 2-0.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of West Ham.
Throw-in West Ham.
Nuno Espirito Santo (Wolverhampton) is making a first substitution, with Fabio Silva replacing Adama Traore.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Wolverhampton.
In London West Ham attack through Jarrod Bowen. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Throw-in for West Ham close to the penalty box.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 66, Goal! Tomas Soucek extends West Ham lead to 3-0 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Aaron Cresswell.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 68, West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
In the minute 71, Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to West Ham's area.
Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
Martin Atkinson signals a West Ham throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In the minute 73, West Ham's Tomas Soucek gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolverhampton defender.
West Ham drive forward but Michail Antonio is judged offside.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ki-Jana Hoever is replacing Nelson Semedo for the away team.
In the minute 74, Nuno Espirito Santo is making the team's third substitution at London Stadium with Vitinha replacing Joao Moutinho.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
In the minute 79, Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In London, Fabio Silva of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Ham defender.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In the minute 81, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez is whistled for offside at London Stadium.
Pedro Neto for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
Mark Noble is replacing Jarrod Bowen for West Ham at London Stadium.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Michail Antonio with Sebastian Haller.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of West Ham.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Martin Atkinson blows to end the match. The final score is 4-0.
West Ham move into a more comfortable 4-0 lead. Sebastian Haller is the scorer with a header!
Great play from Arthur Masuaku to set up the goal.
